name: Oyster and Beyond Blog
tech: HTML, NextJs, Tailwind, JavaScript, Hygraph CMS
summary: A travel blog that showcases a variety of destinations and an option for users to leave comments.

name: VaultKey Password Generator
summary: A password generator that intakes user input and forms a password between 8 and 128 characters.

name: Tasteful Twist Recipe Saver
summary: A website that allows users to save and unsave recipes from eight cuisines around the world.

name: Weather Dashboard
summary: Displays the current weather based on the user's input, using the OpenWeather API.

name: Workday Planner
summary: A work planner that updates when you can book meetings using the jQuery library.

name: Coding Quiz
summary: Using JavaScript to create an interactive quiz and saves the user's score to their local storage
